******************
Introduction
******************

Django REST Framework
=======================

Django REST framework is a powerful and flexible toolkit for building Web APIs. 
DemoFrame is based on Django and uses Django REST for enabling APIs. This APIs enables the communication
betweeen the FrontEnd Application with the DemoFrame Backend (such User management, Permissions, Authentication, Configuration and so on) and 
also between FrontEnd and ACI Applications. 

Documentation about REST Framework can be found on https://www.django-rest-framework.org/
